/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are predominantly red and white, adding a vibrant contrast to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
